latest_revision.text:
Dress shirt, laser-cut, hand-sewn, with custom printed fabric.

Fabric based on Creeper texture straight from the Minecraft videogame, printed at [http://www.spoonflower.com/fabric/892733 SpoonFlower.com (click for texture)]

Shirt design based on existing shirt I had, tore apart, scanned using a large copier, traced in Inkscape, laser cut the fabric, and uploaded the shirt design to [http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:13434 Thingiverse (click for DXF design files & instructions)].

Sewed using normal sewing machine techniques (see Thingiverse for sewing instructions.)

[[File:Classy Creepers.jpg|800px]]
